OUTLINE : Patients receive adjuvant therapy begin 7-14 day gross total surgical resection . Patients receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour day 1 , 8 , 15 . Beginning approximately day 22 , patient undergo radiotherapy daily 5 day week 5.5-6.5 week . Patients also receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour follow cisplatin IV 1-3 hour day 43 , 50 , 57 . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter .
